comment.author: 27742125@N06
comment._content: This momument to Daguerre can presently be seen outside of the Patent Office Building/ Reynolds Center/ Smithsonian's American Art Museum/ National Portrait Gallery across from the MCI center on 7th Street, Washington, DC. It is on loan from the Photographic History Collection at the National Museum of American History.
